parameters.name: Sd
parameters.description: True for single ended, false for double ended

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip side to cut

parameters.name: Dir
parameters.description: True to flip the direction to extrude

parameters.name: T1
parameters.description: Termination type for first end as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: T2
parameters.description: Termination type for second end as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: D1
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for first end in meters

parameters.name: D2
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for second end in meters

parameters.name: Dchk1
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in first direction, false does not allow drafting

parameters.name: Dchk2
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in second direction, false does not allow drafting

parameters.name: Ddir1
parameters.description: True for first draft angle to be inward, false to be outward

parameters.name: Ddir2
parameters.description: True for second draft angle to be inward, false to be outward

parameters.name: Dang1
parameters.description: Draft angle for first end

parameters.name: Dang2
parameters.description: Draft angle for second end

parameters.name: OffsetReverse1
parameters.description: If you chose to offset the first end condition from another face or plane, then True specifies offset in direction away from the sketch, false specifies offset from the face or plane in direction toward the sketch

parameters.name: OffsetReverse2
parameters.description: If you chose to offset the second end condition from another face or plane, then True specifies offset in direction away from the sketch, false specifies offset from the face or plane in direction toward the sketch

parameters.name: TranslateSurface1
parameters.description: When you choose swEndcondOffsetFromSurface as the termination type for the first end, then True specifies that the end of the extrusion is a translation of the reference surface, false specifies to use a true offset

parameters.name: TranslateSurface2
parameters.description: When you choose swEndcondOffsetFromSurface as the termination type for the second end, then True specifies that the end of the extrusion is a translation of the reference surface, false specifies to use a true offset

parameters.name: Merge
parameters.description: True to merge the results in a multibody part, false to not

parameters.name: UseFeatScope
parameters.description: True if the feature only affects selected bodies, false if the feature affects all bodies

parameters.name: UseAutoSelect
parameters.description: True to automatically select all bodies and have the feature affect those bodies, false to select the bodies the feature affects (see Remarks )

parameters.name: T0
parameters.description: Start condition as defined in swStartConditions_e

parameters.name: StartOffset
parameters.description: If t0 set to swStartOffset, then specify offset value

parameters.name: FlipStartOffset
parameters.description: If t0 set to swStartOffset, then True to flip the direction or false to not

parameters.name: Sd
parameters.description: True for single ended, false for double ended

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip side to cut

parameters.name: Dir
parameters.description: True to flip the direction to extrude

parameters.name: T1
parameters.description: Termination type for first end as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: T2
parameters.description: Termination type for second end as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: D1
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for first end in meters

parameters.name: D2
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for second end in meters

parameters.name: Dchk1
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in first direction, false does not allow drafting

parameters.name: Dchk2
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in second direction, false does not allow drafting

parameters.name: Ddir1
parameters.description: True for first draft angle to be inward, false to be outward

parameters.name: Ddir2
parameters.description: True for second draft angle to be inward, false to be outward

parameters.name: Dang1
parameters.description: Draft angle for first end

parameters.name: Dang2
parameters.description: Draft angle for second end

parameters.name: OffsetReverse1
parameters.description: If you chose to offset the first end condition from another face or plane, then True specifies offset in direction away from the sketch, false specifies offset from the face or plane in direction toward the sketch

parameters.name: OffsetReverse2
parameters.description: If you chose to offset the second end condition from another face or plane, then True specifies offset in direction away from the sketch, false specifies offset from the face or plane in direction toward the sketch

parameters.name: TranslateSurface1
parameters.description: When you choose swEndcondOffsetFromSurface as the termination type for the first end, then True specifies that the end of the extrusion is a translation of the reference surface, false specifies to use a true offset

parameters.name: TranslateSurface2
parameters.description: When you choose swEndcondOffsetFromSurface as the termination type for the second end, then True specifies that the end of the extrusion is a translation of the reference surface, false specifies to use a true offset

parameters.name: Merge
parameters.description: True to merge the results in a multibody part, false to not

parameters.name: UseFeatScope
parameters.description: True if the feature only affects selected bodies, false if the feature affects all bodies

parameters.name: UseAutoSelect
parameters.description: True to automatically select all bodies and have the feature affect those bodies, false to select the bodies the feature affects (see Remarks )

parameters.name: T0
parameters.description: Start condition as defined in swStartConditions_e

parameters.name: StartOffset
parameters.description: If t0 set to swStartOffset, then specify offset value

parameters.name: FlipStartOffset
parameters.description: If t0 set to swStartOffset, then True to flip the direction or false to not

remarks:
The default direction for cut operations is opposite the sketch normal. The default direction for boss operations is along the sketch normal. Setting the Dir argument to True reverses the default direction. For double-ended extrusions, Direction 2 is always opposite of Direction 1.
The default sketch normal is the same as the face or plane normal where the sketch was placed. To determine this normal vector, see
IFace2::Normal
and
IRefPlane::Transform
, respectively.
When useAutoSelect is false, the user must select the bodies that the feature will affect.
When using cut or cavity features that result in multiple bodies, you cannot select to keep all of the resulting bodies or one or more selected bodies.
To extrude a 3D sketch, select:
3D sketch with selection mark 0.
Extrusion direction edge with selection mark 16.
